CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Product_Family__c ) = 'CLOUD_PRODUCTS' || TEXT(Product_Family__c )= 'DESKTOP_SUBSCRIPTION' || TEXT(Product_Family__c )= 'DISTRIBUTION_CLOUD' || TEXT(Product_Family__c )= 'INTELLIGENCE' || TEXT(Product_Family__c )= 'SALESPAD_SUBSCRIPTION' || TEXT(Product_Family__c )= 'ANALYTICS CLOUD' || TEXT(Product_Family__c )= 'SUBSCRIPTION_DISCOUNT', Total_Price__c , 0.00)
CustomField.label: Subscription Amount
